documentation:
https://www.mongodb.com/docs/manual/reference/method/db.collection.find/

method: POST

address: https://data.mongodb-api.com/app/data-jxtnbij/endpoint/data/v1/action/findOne

headers:{
    //...some auto generated by postman headers
    "Content-Type" : "application/json"
}
body: {
    "dataSource": "MediaDB",
    "database": "media",
    "collection": "books",
    "filter": {
      "title": "harry potter"
    }
  }
